element.name: rptype
element.sql: SELECT NVL (l.shortname, SUBSTR (TRIM (REPLACE (l.name, '.', ' ')), 1, 15)) loc, cc.tree, cc.name treename, c4.article, c.name, c4.showlevel, c4.shelfs, c4.xfacings, NVL ( (SELECT 1 FROM smcardmatrix a, smassortmatrixloc m WHERE m.idmatrix = a.idmatrix AND m.storeloc = l.id AND a.article = c4.article), 0) nm, DECODE (c.accepted, 1, 1, 0) accepted FROM c4rstocklevels c4, smstorelocations l, svcardname c, sacardclass cc WHERE c4.storeloc = l.id AND c.article = c4.article AND cc.id = c.idclass ORDER BY NVL (l.shortname, SUBSTR (TRIM (REPLACE (l.name, '.', ' ')), 1, 15)), cc.tree
